results.overview: Three short stories by shock-meister Stephen King are linked by a stray cat that roams from one tale to the next in this creepy triptych that begins as Dick (James Woods) tries to quit smoking by any means necessary. Next, we meet Johnny, an adulterous man who's forced by his lover's husband onto a building's hazardous ledge. Finally, Amanda is threatened by an evil gnome who throws suspicion on the family cat.
results.title: Cat's Eye

results.overview: Three cat burgling sisters have to go up against the police and a Chinese crime syndicate in order to rescue their kidnapped father.
results.title: Cat's Eye

results.original_title: ルパン三世VSキャッツ・アイ
results.overview: The Cat's Eye sisters are again aiming to steal three paintings that once belonged to their father, but this time, Lupin is after the same catch. But the paintings will also reveal a long-buried mystery.
results.title: Lupin the Third vs. Cat's Eye

results.original_title: La morte negli occhi del gatto
results.overview: In a small Scottish village, horribly murdered bodies keep turning up. Suspicion falls upon the residents of a nearby castle that is haunted by a curse involving a killer cat.
results.title: Seven Deaths in the Cat's Eye

results.original_title: 木更津キャッツアイ 日本シリーズ
results.overview: When Bussan learns he has less than a year to live, he decides to continue his life as usual. He spends his time with his friends, a band called Kisarazu Cat's Eye. Their funny adventures range from playing gigs to solving a mystery surrounding counterfeit money, but Bussan's impending death is never far away.
results.title: Kisarazu Cat's Eye: Nihon Series

results.original_title: 木更津キャッツアイ ワールドシリーズ
results.overview: After terminally ill Bussan finally passes away he misses hanging out with his still living friends and decides to return to Kisarazu. In his ghost form however only his most trusted friends can see him, and his meddling in the lives of the living results in the return of Ozzy and a long dead team of American baseball players who drowned off the shores of Kisarazu. It's down to Bussan and the Cats to save the day and restore the town to order, but can Bussan bring himself to say bye-bye once and for all?
results.title: Kisarazu Cat's Eye: World Series
